籤詩版本二:
Mwezi ukuwala kumwamba ndipo m’nyumbamo muli phee.
Chonde pemphererani mtendere wamumtima, Yunxia Powder, sinthani zachifundo panthawiyi, ndipo lembani buku mnyumbamo.
詩意:
Mu hexagram iyi, mitambo ndi nkhungu zimaphimba mwezi.
Pitirizani kunjira zakale ngakhale zinthu sizikuyenda bwino.
籤詩故事一:
◇Iye Wenxiu anaphedwa
M’nthawi ya Jiajing ya Ufumu wa Ming, a He Wenxiu anapangidwa ndi nduna zachinyengo ndipo banja lake linali m’mavuto. He Wenxiu ananamiziridwa ndi wopezerera wina dzina lake Zhang Tang ndipo anatsekeredwa m’ndende. Wenxiu adapeza komwe kuli Wang Lanying ndipo adavala ngati wobwebweta kuti adziwe. Awiriwo adalumikizananso, ndipo Zhang Tang adaphedwa.
聖意: Kusakhazikika kunyumba, ndimapempherera chitetezo, mavuto azachuma, zovuta zamabizinesi, zovuta zaukwati, kusowa kwa Liujia, oyenda pansi kutsekereza minda, kuwonongeka kwa mbozi za silika, kuwonongeka kwa ziweto, anthu osowa, milandu ya anthu, kusamuka, katundu wotayika, matenda, manda amapiri a Yan'an ayenera kukonzedwa
第X籤: Zambiri makumi atatu ndi zisanu ndi zitatu
